parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate.  The post promotes a Christmas event ("Aprinderea Luminitelor") and does not mention any political candidate or party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and promotes a community event. It is clearly intended to reach a wide audience in Ploiești.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote a Christmas event, not to influence the vote for any candidate in the parliamentary elections. There is no mention of voting, candidates, or political parties.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post is an advertisement for a community event, not a journalistic piece. While it might contain some factual information about the event, its primary purpose is not to inform the public in a journalistic manner.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express a personal opinion related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>539445968997793</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a Christmas event in Ploiești. It does not mention any political candidates, parties, or advocate for or against any political position. The content is entirely unrelated to the parliamentary elections.  The paid advertisement is for a community event and does not violate Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Mihai Polițeanu</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
